issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.Controls >  text area > basic
2.tap text area to invoke keyboard
3.toggle so the field is no longer editable.

note behavior - keyboard stays up (text area won't take input) and position indicator up as well

expecetd: appropriate to take down keyboard and remove insertion indicator?
fields.summary: Android: text field with editable set to false shows positional indicator
fields.environment: galaxy tab, droid 1, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/19/11 07:45 3ecace1...)

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
